content: प्रतापः {@--1@} Heat, warmth; <ls>Pt. 1. 107.</ls> {@--2@} Radiance, glowing heat; <ls>Ku. 2. 24.</ls> {@--3@} Splendour, brilliancy. {@--4@} Dignity, majesty, glory; <ls>Mv. 2. 4.</ls> {@--5@} Courage, valour, heroism; प्रतापस्तस्य भानोश्च युगपद् व्यानशे दिशः <ls>R. 4. 15</ls> (where प्रताप means ‘heat’ also); <ls n="R.">4. 30.</ls> {@--6@} Spirit, vigour, energy. {@--7@} Ardour, zeal.
